title: Temple university area homelike atmosphere
description:
Charming space a few feet from intersection of 19th and Berks and 5-7 city blocks from Temple University. Nestled in North Philadelphia between Brewerytown and Kelly Drive to the west, Temple University and Fishtown to the east, Germantown and Temple Medical School to the north, Benjamin Franklin Parkway and Fairmount to the South. Conveniently 5 minutes by car/Uber to nearby grocery store and businesses or 10 minutes to neighborhood/center city entertainment & restaurant venues. Buses nearby. Enough space to store bicycle inside.
Rent is $1,100 per month plus utilities: gas, electric and wifi responsibility of tenant and water usage is billed.
Enclosed patio yard in rear and washer/dryer in basement. House features semi-furnished living room and dining room plus kitchen with appliances. Second floor has three bedrooms and one bathroom.  Text or call  show contact info
to schedule a tour. Suggested appointment times are weekday evenings from 6pm to 7pm or weekend afternoons from 1pm to 2pm.
Application fee of $45 per applicant includes background check.  First, Last and Security $3,300 to move in.

title: Why Rent When You Can Buy!!!
description:
NOT ENOUGH $$$ TO BUY A HOME?
You’d be surprised how little you really need!
Owning A Home is so much more valuable than paying for rent making the Landlord's Pockets larger while making yours smaller.
If you have limited cash but the desire, we can help! Learn how you can stop paying rent and finally own a home of your own you can purchase your new home with the first month's rent, the last month's rent, and a month's security. Also, you can use your income tax return in 2023 and buy your first home. Why rent when you can own? it's really that simple, call me or email me and I will explain the process of getting a mortgage compared to signing a lease. It's that Easy
If you are considering buying a home now or in the near future I'm here to help as your local Realtor, just send me an email or call the 888 ext 1460 number and I'll be glad to walk you through the steps of becoming a homeowner with 10 easy steps!
Elisamuel Cruz

title: Welcome home to this spacious updated one bedroom, one bath end unit
description: Welcome home to this spacious updated one bedroom, one bath end unit condo. Located in the Oxford of Blue Bell, this gem backs to open space. Mudroom-like entry with storage bench, rich hardwood floors that continue throughout the living area. Off of the living room there is a spacious sun lit dining area and access to a private patio that faces the courtyard. The kitchen offers tons of storage, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar. Oversized bedroom has a walk-in closet with built-in organizers and connects to the full bath with designer tiles. The Oxford community offers acres of lush grounds including tennis courts, pool, gym and playground with picnic tables, dog park and a walking trail around a beautiful lake. Plenty of parking and close proximity to great restaurants and shopping. Nothing to do but unpack and enjoy your new home.

title: Stroll down one of the prettiest tree-lined blocks of Pine Street to y
description: Stroll down one of the prettiest tree-lined blocks of Pine Street to your new condo in Garden Court. Enter through the secured gate and step into a tranquil courtyard with koi pond and lush landscaping. Unit C103 is a front corner one-bedroom flat with your own private entrance. Inside you will find the perfect blend of charming details and modern updates. Original wood floors, gorgeous re-leaded glass windows, hand-stripped wood door with crystal knobs, tasteful paint colors, and the all-white kitchen provide a blank slate for the next owner. The large main living space is bright and open with plenty of space for living, dining, and cooking. The kitchen features new cabinets, quartz counters, and appliances. Tucked off the kitchen is a utility/laundry closet with a washer/dryer combo unit. The bedroom is very large and has a surprisingly large walk-in closet. The black and white bath tile bath is updated while retaining its original character. One window A/C cools the whole apartment with the help of two modern ceiling fans. You won't mind working from home in this professionally managed building that includes a gorgeous indoor, heated art deco pool with Moravian tile, library, community room, gym, locker room, and updated elevators.

title: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate
description: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate Hospital have to offer, this spacious, cheerful, and charming 1 BR/1.5 ba condo offers a quiet respite from the city, with unique features including a huge private basement that doubles your space for storage, office, workshop, gym, or whatever you'd like to create. Vestibule opens to an open plan living area with hardwood floors, high ceilings, crown molding, built ins, space for a dining table, and even a gas fireplace for chilly days and nights. The open kitchen with island seating features a gas range, granite counters, stainless appliances, and a window over the sink to let the sunlight in. There's even a powder room for guests as well. The master bedroom has double closets with storage above, and a private en suite bath with tub and shower. Off the bedroom, you'll find a small and lovely private patio for your morning coffee or drinks to unwind after a long day. The private basement is nearly as large as the unit itself, and includes front loading washer/dryer & Bilco door to the street to bring in any large items or bicycles, etc. Low condo fees and incredible location make this a smart buy. Short walk to Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill Trail, and U City/Penn/CHOP. Everything you could imagine is right outside your door: boutiques, coffee, farmers markets, gym, groceries, restaurants are all within steps. Greenfield catchment.

title: 1 Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Near Coffee Shops
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 414 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 4th floor features large windows that mainly face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view of Chancellor Street including the loading dock. One window in the bedroom area faces south and has a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Bella Turka, Tselaine, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, and Theory. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at Elixr, La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Bluestone Lane, Di Bruno Bros, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 4th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Wood floors
* Large mainly east-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One south-facing window with Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 414 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!

Philadelphia, PA 19103

description:
Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom and Oversized Windows located in the heart of the historic Old City! 315 Flats is an Elevator Building with a welcoming lobby featuring Marble Floors and an Intercom/Camera system for Additional Security. Upon entering unit 301, you're greeted by 10-foot ceilings and South-Facing Oversized Windows filling the living space with natural light. The kitchen features Stainless Steel Appliances, a built-in Microwave and Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Modern Cabinetry, and an Island overlooking the living area. Hardwood Floors are throughout the living space and bedroom. The living room/dining room combo offers views of The historic Quaker Meeting House and plenty of room for entertaining. The Bathroom includes a Double Sink, a Tub/Shower combo, and Tiled floors. The in-unit Washer & Dryer are conveniently located in a dedicated closet. The 10-foot Ceilings and Oversized Windows continue in the spacious bedroom, which includes a Walk-In Closet and a modern shelving unit for additional storage. 315 Flats is situated in the heart of the neighborhood and steps from excellent restaurants, shops, Spruce Harbor Park, Independence Hall, Philadelphia's most historic sites, and all that Old City offers. title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.

title: Beautiful Newly Upgraded 2 Bedroom
description:
Welcome to Drexelbrook, where quality and comfort meet. We are one of the largest garden type apartment communities in the Philadelphia vicinity. Established in 1948, Drexelbrook enjoys a reputation of excellence in our community. Situated on 134 acres in the Drexel Hill section of Delaware County, Drexelbrook encompasses one, two and three bedroom apartments spread over 90 federal style buildings. The building types include Walk-Up, Courtyard and Town Houses. The buildings are a desirable two-story layout. Some of our distinctive amenities include:
Parking, On and off-Street
Garages available
High speed internet access
Three On-site Playgrounds

On-site maintenance
24 hour emergency maintenance
overnight security

Day-care

Bakery
Drexelbrook is the smart choice for those looking for a quiet and centrally located place to live. Easy access to Philadelphia, Media, King of Prussia and Delaware via public transportation, driving via US 1, I-476 (Blue Route), I-95 and the I-76. title: Enjoy modern elegance & contemporary loft living in the heart of Bella
description:
Enjoy modern elegance & contemporary loft living in the heart of Bella Vista offering 1,860 square feet of living space, 20’ ceilings, a deeded roof top deck and 2-car parking. New York City style loft with tall energy efficient windows showcasing beautiful sunsets and breathtaking views of Philadelphia. The luxurious Lofts of Bella Vista is an early 20th Century Industrial pet friendly building. This penthouse unit is one of only 2 penthouse units that include a rooftop deck. This 2 bedroom, 2 bath penthouse unit offers a mirrored floor plan with the bedrooms situated on opposite sides of an open concept kitchen/living layout. Both bedrooms provide substantial morning light, and ample closet/storage options. The kitchen and living space allow for seamless entertaining with exposed bricks & polished concrete floors throughout. Entry provides large coat closet and hall laundry room/pantry. Kitchen by Schiffini with marble countertops and waterfall marble kitchen island. Bathrooms with soaking tubs and vanities by Rifra with Zucchetti fixtures. This unit has custom design features by interior designer Michelle Gage (showcased in design blogs & multiple publications). You will experience the European flair of this completely rehabbed warehouse, which was once inhabited by Curtis Publishing Company. Enjoy 2-car heated garage parking (via parking lift), 24-hour security with front desk concierge, fitness room, a community media/meeting room with prep kitchen, secured storage unit (monthly fee), and bike storage room. Conveniently located within walking distance to the Italian Market, Avenue of the Arts, Passyunk Square and some of Philadelphia’s top restaurants, boutique shopping, a variety of name brand commercial stores, public transportation and more. Easy access to major highways, sports complexes, and Philadelphia International Airport. Schedule your tour today and come see what living in the heart of one of Philadelphia’s heavily sought-after neighborhoods could offer you!
1101 Washington Ave #PH3

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, Washer and Dryer, Gym
description:
The home at 1202 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 12th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as November 4, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Paper Source, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, and Boyds. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Restaurant Aleksandar, Rosy's Taco Bar, Scarpetta, Trattoria Carina, a.kitchen, DanDan, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Harper's Garden, Harp & Crown, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, Giuseppe & Sons, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a delicious cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!

title: Listed on the National Historic Register, On site washer and dryer
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Hello, I'm a Full-time Working Mom with a wonderful 15 year old son looking for a rental property, I'm transferring my Job from Fairfax, Virginia to Columbia, SC starting December 1st, I would like to find something after Thanksgiving to move into. Please No Scammers.
Hey Asheville,
my name is Katie, I'm a 31 yo looking for a room!
I am looking for a room for just me under $650 in the Asheville area for December. If its a good fit, I'm willing to pay part/full rent for November to secure a spot.
I don’t have any pets, but I would love to live with a dog or cat.
I'm very open to living with room mates, with preference given to folks that love plants, the earth, and a healthy lifestyle. While not required, I love living with people that like to share nutritious food,
house camaraderie and have good conversations.
A little about me: I am friendly, clean, have no problem being direct
around communication, respect space and tend to be out of the house a
lot. I went to school for botany ( I love plants ), have studied herbalism, completed a yoga teacher training,
love studying astrology/astronomy,
enjoy mountain biking and hiking.
And I have recently been diving into the world of fermentation, with a focus
on meads, wines and vinegars. I love sharing botanical drinks made with love, alcoholic or not.
If you've got a room, give a call; if I don't answer, I'm probably working so leave a voicemail or text
P.S. I’m open to pet sitting or work trades situations but pls, Craigslist peeps, do not contact me with solicitations. I’m not looking for companionship.
Hi there!
We know how fast properties around the Asheville area can go so we thought we would post here and see if the universe can help us connect the dots.
My Fiance and I are in our mid 20s, we have both spent most of our lives in Asheville and we own/run a successful small business downtown. We are super outdoorsy people that love to travel, play music and spend time with our 2 sweet dogs in nature. We have rented a home in east Asheville for the last 4 years now but we want to make room for my little brother to live with us when he moves here for college in December. We also want to get out of the busy city and into something more peaceful and private.
Our ideal situation would be a 3br house or 2br with a mother in law/ basement apt on some land and no more than 30 minutes from Asheville. A fenced yard for our dogs would be a huge bonus though not a necessity. I was a landscaper and gardener for many years and will tend to the land as well as fix anything up with my handyman skills.
If you are looking to rent a special property and we sound like a good fit please reach out!
Thank you for reading, many blessings.
I'm a 63 year old creative dude who is looking for a creator's crib to move into. Maybe you are a creator and you have a place to share? Or maybe you live in a creative community and are looking for others to move in. The pandemic kind of screwed my credit, but I know how to hustle and make money - rent is always paid.
I'm currently in Largo, FL and would like to get away from the heat, I just can't stand it anymore. I'm an artist, writer and short video creator and have all the furnishings for an apt. My father is buried in Waynesville at the Veterans Cemetery, we used to have a restaurant in Maggie Valley. I grew up in NC, but moved to Florida at a young age.
If you are a fellow creator and want to a roommate for your move into a larger or different place, I'm your man. I've got some time at current place, but want to get out of here and into new place. I'm open to discussing options. I'm easy to get along with, I'm quiet and usually working on a project, reading or watching TV.
I'm a native of Tampa Bay and can provide real references about who I am and what I am about. Interested parties let's discuss opportunities. Thank you for your attention to this post - I hope to find some fellow creators who I can fit in with and enjoy living with or around.
Looking for a 1-2 bedroom house/apt etc somewhere in the $900 or less range, around Moore/lee county that allows pets (well mannered small dog & cat) please let me know if you have anything available :)
Very business oriented, well mannered, Handsome black (34) Navy Veteran with  seeking a comfortable and secure living situation that can be beneficial to both parties involved. I’m a very good role model, I also am very in tune with the stock market and trading. I’m willing to work around to house to compensate for the first month of rent, while I secure employment. Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. I would like to live with an older if possible.
Single here drug free looking for clean and safe room and board. I have experience with cleaning and maintenance. I prefer someone who has a farm who needs help and willing to train. I'm not looking for anything sexual; I just hit a bump in life and I'm looking to get back on my feet.
I am a 27 year old professional chef seeking a live-in work arrangement somewhere in the Pickens/Easley/Traveler's Rest areas - possibly open to other areas between Brevard and Anderson. Looking to move by the end of December. About me:
- I have been a chef for 5 years and working in food service for 10+ years.
- I am food handler certified, I can cook a variety of dishes and cuisines, and I have experience accommodating special diets.
- I currently work as a catering chef in Spartanburg, looking to move closer to family without being tied down to a traditional job situation.
- I am a laidback, humble person, easy to get along with. I generally keep to myself but have no problem with conversation.
I'm looking for someone who has an extra room, preferably with a private bath, who is interested in renting their space in exchange for an agreed upon number of meals prepared each week (including clean up afterward, not including purchasing product unless compensated). I have included pictures of my work and am willing to prepare a sample meal for serious prospects.
Please respond with your location in the subject line. No scammers, perverts or unkind people need reply.
*No homes with cats, as I am allergic*
Looking for a room to rent $15 a night furnished just until Monday I have a cat he will be with me in the room and not be roaming around in the house..thank you 🙏
Hi, I'm Leticia, I'm a nice, quiet, and neat looking for a roomie in the Durham, NC area. I work alot so I won't be home much and won't be much of a bother when I am home. My budget is around 700-900$ a month and I am looking to move asap. Text, call or email me if Interested!
Lease takeover from late Dec/Jan - June, $1750/month which includes water and trash pickup services. Opportunity to continue lease after! Very pet friendly apartment complex (The Morgan at Chapel Hill) with 2 dog parks, a playground for kids, a great pool/grill area, and wonderful management. Located on the Durham/Chapel Hill border roughly 5 minutes from I-40 and 10 minutes from UNC. Best apartment we've ever lived in, but have to move out unfortunately. Willing to negotiate rent price if needed.
Family of 5 looking for a home for rent! Anywhere in NC. We have good income great rental history and excellent credit. We are willing to pay 6 months of rent up front for the right home. Minimum 3bed 2 bath. Max $1500.00
Please send me and email if you may have something for us to look at.
Looking for a reasonably priced studio or one bedroom in Raleigh. Will respond with details with any response to ad.
Looking to move ASAP
Hi, my name is Kymburlee, 35. I'm looking to rent a room or apartment in Warner Robins. I moved here 4 months ago. I've been working Bojangles since I moved here. Life just been riding my back these last couple of weeks and I just need some peace. It's just me. I stay to myself. I work and come home. The biggest thing is PEACE. I don't like drama. I'm not looking for nothing more. So please don't write me with bs. I will attach a couple of pics just so you know who I am. But please don't be rude and nasty.
Thank you to anybody who can help"

title: 1 BR Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Dog Spa, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 915 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 9th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, rag & bone, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Have a wonderful breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, a.kitchen, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Elixr, K'Far, and Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of bread at Metropolitan Bakery. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Pet-friendly community complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 9th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 915 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
* Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice. *

title: Ultra Modern 2 bedroom 2 full bath on Frankford Ave
description:
Welcome to this Gorgeous, ultra modern, sun dappled, 2 bed, 2 full bath unit at Penn Treaty Residences at 1405 Frankford Avenue. This Amazing condominium is located at the very heart of Fishtown, Philadelphia's most dynamic, vibrant and sought-after neighborhood!
Situated directly behind Fishtown's historic, and newly remodeled, Rose Garden, enter this barely 3.5 year old, secure, 30 unit building and enjoy your urban oasis to the fullest. Entering #502 you will find rich mocha colored flooring throughout, an ideally located laundry closet and your open concept kitchen/living/dining room. The designer kitchen boasts double thick quartz countertops and island, high end GE stainless steel appliances including a double wall oven, cooktop stove and French door refrigerator.
Each spacious bedroom offers great light and the primary boasts and en suite full bathroom as well. Your modern bathrooms both feature Italian tile flooring, Aqua Green accent tiling and porcelain vanities.This beautifully maintained building's amenities include a spacious common roof deck with spectacular 360 views including Center City and the Ben Franklin Bridge, storage bins for each unit, bike room in the basement, secure key fob entry and of course an elevator.
Mere steps from La Columbe, Suraya, WM Mulherin's & Sons, Kensington Quarters, Ramona Susan's Bake Shop, Heffe Tacos, City Fitness gym and a myriad of other bars, restaurants, bakeries, souperies, specialty shops, nail salons, boutique clothiers and so much more. This is why Forbes magazine called Fishtown America's Hottest "New" Neighborhood in 2018 and it's only gotten better since. A 5 minute walk to the EL or multiple bus lines, easy access to I-76 & I-95, Walk & Bike Scores of 94 ("Paradise") so what are you waiting for? Make it yours today!
Listing courtesy of Coldwell Banker Realty

title: 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 532 S 15th Street, #1! This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of of South Street, walking distance to Center City and Rittenhouse Square. Enter on main level into the spacious living, dining, and kitchen area with lovely bay window in the front. Your modern kitchen boasts beautiful white cabinetry, ample prep space, and sleek stainless steel appliances including electric stove + oven, dishwasher, and fridge. There's a large closet for storage by the kitchen area. Continue back to your 1st bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom features a vanity, window, and separate shower with glass door. Your bedroom is sizable and bright, with a gorgeous accent wall, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and large closet. There's a door that leads to your outside space - perfect for the warmer months! Head down the lower level to view your other bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom offers stunning floor-to-ceiling tiling, a lighted vanity, cabinet over the toilet, and a full size shower / tub combo. The 2nd bedroom features plush wall-to-wall carpeting, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's an additional storage area to the back, plus in-unit laundry and central a/c for added convenience. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this is a hot location right around the corner from tons of restaurants, cafes and bars. You'll be steps from the Lombard-South Station for the Broad Street Line, plus surrounded by public transportation bus routes. Walkable to the Marian Anderson Recreation Center and Rittenhouse Square. Check out neighborhood hotspots like Bob & Barbara's Lounge, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, Loco Pez, Tio Flores, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and monthly pet rent of $30/month for dogs and $25/month for cats). There is a maximum weight of 30lbs for dogs. Tenants responsible for: upfront payments of $125 for common area electricity + $395 for water. Tenants are also required to put PECO + wifi/cable in their name. (If a longer lease is secured, prepayments will be adjusted). Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: Deluxe 1 Bed With Well Over 1,000 Sqft, Beautiful View of Washington!!
description:
Deluxe one bedroom with well over 1,000 square feet and a view overlooking beautiful Washington Square park and the center city skyline. This home features parquet wood flooring, a renovated kitchen with granite counters and stainless appliances, a renovated bathroom as well, tremendous closets including an extremely large entry closet which can also double as the perfect home office. The Hopkinson House is a very well run high-rise building which has (extra fees) underground monthly parking, a rooftop pool with sensational skyline views, and a convenience store accessed directly from the building. The rent includes utilities. Cable and internet are an extra $59.00 per mo currently. At the signing of the lease, the tenant is required to pay the first month’s rent plus two month’s security.
604-36 S Washington Sq #1714

title: Beautiful courtyards, This is a cat friendly community
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Professional on-site management team
-Smoke-free apartments available
-On site washer and dryer
-Beautiful courtyards
-New fitness center
-Elevator building
-Garage and parking lot available
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge
-This is a cat friendly community
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
For more information, visit us at: https://livekormanres.com/tvhkjtyh/korman-residential-on-the-main-line-casa-del-sol-

title: High quality 3 bed 3 bath bi-level Brewerytown apt with parking space!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.
Features:
Central Air/Heat
Washer Dryer
Parking space
2 entrances
Dishwasher
Gas stove
3 full bathrooms
Tons of natural light

title: Unique Studio Murphy Bed Included In The Rent.
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Stylish one bedroom plus den
description: Stylish one bedroom plus den featuring 1300+ sq. ft. of living space , underground parking, elevator and 5 years left of tax abatement. Located in a distinctive community of 20 units, One West Hartwell Lane is situated in the heart of Chestnut Hill and provides an easy, maintenance free lifestyle. With more than $50,000 in upgrades to lighting, appliances and custom cabinetry, this beautiful unit features a spacious gallery hall with track lighting that provides the perfect space to display art, an open concept living and dining room with high ceilings, custom woodwork and beautiful windows that provide tree top views of “The Avenue”. The main bedroom is spacious and includes doors to the private balcony, perfect for morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening, two walk-in closets and a luxurious main bathroom with double wide vanity and extra large shower. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, quartz counters and a laundry/pantry area with sink and extra storage. The beautiful den/guest room features custom lighting and cabinetry. The unit includes custom blinds and window treatments, has been freshly painted and is in absolute move-in condition. This is a pet friendly building with easy access to the unit via the elevator from the underground parking garage which also includes a private storage room. One West is located in one of Philadelphia’s most desirable neighborhoods - Chestnut Hill - known for its beautiful architecture, access to Fairmount Park, easy commute to Center City and for its walkable business district filled with wonderful shops and restaurants.

title: 2BR 1 Bath Apartment off Girard
description:
Apartment is in Northern Liberties - great location (5th and Girard)
It's available for December 1st move-in with lease ending June 2023. You can work with the landlord for a 12-month lease or longer. The rent is affordable for the location.
Utilities are gas, electric, and internet. Water is included in the rent. You'll need first and last month's rent, and a security deposit. First and last is $2,900 and deposit is $1,450 for a total of $4,350 upfront.
The apartment is two blocks away from Piazza with restaurants, shops, bars, and clubs all within walking distance. Parks are also close by, including Penn Treaty and Liberty Lands. The Market-Frankford Line is a 10 min walk and the bus is 1 block away. Acme, a big grocery store, is a 5-minute walk.
There's a washer/dryer in the unit and hardwood floors all throughout. The apartment is on the second floor in the rear of the building. There are only 2 other units in the building. The landlord is on the 3rd floor and there's a nice, friendly tenant on the front 1-bedroom unit. The building is quiet and your bedrooms are in the back. When you first walk in you have your living room, the bathroom, the kitchen, and then the two bedrooms. The very back bedroom is larger than the 2nd bedroom. USPS mail drop-off is on the 1st floor.
There are no pets in the building and the landlord is cat friendly. The landlord is looking for someone or a couple of folx to take over the lease. My roommate and I are moving closer to Center City and getting more space; I got a new job that pays more. Reach out with any questions.

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Concierge, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, L'Occitane, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Spice Finch, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Restaurant Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a cup of coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Grab a French baguette or slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Relax in the Wintergarden at Dilworth Park. There is so much to do in this neighborhood!

title: What the What?
description:
Welcome to 1807 Valley Road, West Chester! This 2-bedroom, 1-bath rental condo is conveniently located in Goshen Valley, East Goshen Township. One-floor living at its best! Hardwood flooring in the living room, laminate floors in the bedrooms, and ceramic tile in the kitchen and bathroom. The bright spacious living room features a large brick fireplace for cozy winter evenings, ceiling fan, and large glass sliding doors leading out to a private concrete patio. The dining room and hallway feature lovely wainscotting. The spacious primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet with organizers. The second bedroom can also be used as a home office with a closet for extra storage space. Washer and dryer are also included in the unit. Community amenities include swimming pool, tennis courts, playground, and clubhouse. Convenient to downtown West Chester with its many bars, restaurants, shops, and local theater. Close to beautiful Chester County parks and trails. Easy access to major roads and public transportation to center city Philadelphia. Schedule an appointment to see this lovely rental today!

title: Shut The Front Door Of Your New Home!
description:
You won't find another rental home with this much space, two-car garage, unbelievable views with an expansive deck, on a private street in this entire area. This nicely appointed 2,708 sq ft, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath rental home has everything you want and need, including beautiful wood flooring throughout the main living level. With the open floor plan concept, the kitchen easily opens into the family and dining areas, making entertaining a breeze. Off the kitchen is an additional room filled with natural sunlight that can be used as an office or an extra bedroom. The spacious living and dining rooms have crown molding throughout. Enjoy the beautiful gas fireplace in the large family room during those cold wintery days and nights and from the dining room, step through large glass sliding doors to a 600 sq ft two-level deck with great views and stairs leading down to a nicely sized paver patio area below. The upper level has two ample sized bedrooms, a full hall bath, and a large primary suite with tall, vaulted ceilings, two walk-in closets and an ensuite bath complete with tile floors, double sink vanity, soaking tub, and stall shower. The laundry room finishes off the 2nd level. This home has an unfinished basement for lots of storage, central air and gas heating and is in a very convenient location and within walking distance to restaurants and shops in charming downtown Conshohocken. Close to Septa Regional Rail station and easy access to major routes to center city Philadelphia. Make your appointment today to see this great rental before it is no longer available.

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Lockers, Sauna
description:
The studio apartment home at 507 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 5th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Paper Source, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Scotch & Soda, Bluemercury, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, CB2, H&M, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Bella Turka, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, Tselaine, Banana Republic Factory, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack. Have a wonderful dining experience at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Friday Saturday Sunday, Monk's Cafe, and The Continental Mid-town. Sip a cup of coffee at Ultimo, Elixr, Vibrant, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Konditori, Nook, K'Far, and La Colombe. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Sample the Rittenhouse Churro sundae from El Merkury. Pick up warm cookies from Insomnia Cookies. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theatres. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Sauna
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with a park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* Online resident portal for maintenance requests, rent payments, and more
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 5th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large north-facing windows
* City skyline view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 507 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

Text me if interested:~(415) six39-72two4
Apartamento recientemente renovado de una habitación en el edificio Filadelfia, sala de estar, techos altos con ventiladores, pisos de madera noble, baño con azulejos, cocina con azulejos, patio, lavadora/secadora en una hermosa casa victoriana en el distrito de West Chester. Fantastic opportunity to live in the highly sought after Powelton Village North area. You can literally walk to school from this building! We are located 1 block from the Dragon Route pick up location at 36th and Spring Garden Streets. Even if you don’t have a car it’s super easy to get around. This apartment has a great layout with tall ceilings, tons of natural light, hardwood floors, all wood kitchen cabinets, and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, microwave, stove, and full size refrigerator. Washer and Dryer in your apartment as well as a spacious living room with double pained windows, intercom system, and alarm system. title: vWelcome to 943 Railway Square, a move-in ready, end-unit,.
description: Welcome to 943 Railway Square, a move-in ready, end-unit 1-bedroom at West Chester’s conveniently located Exton Station. Updated from top to bottom, The entrance to your unit features new gray vinyl plank flooring. On the main level, you’ll find your completely remodeled kitchen, featuring new, sleek black cabinets, white statement lighting, white subway tile backsplash, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, a portable island, and gray vinyl plank flooring. A bay window brings in plenty of light. This area also features your newer full-size washer and dryer. Additional updates include your new water heater and HVAC. Enjoy open concept living with a dining area featuring white statement lighting. Two large windows bring in plenty of light into the living room. This space features high ceilings, creating an open feel as you ascend the spiral staircase to a loft, the perfect spot for a work-from-home office. Back on the main level, you will find your primary bedroom, with 2 windows that bring in lovely natural light, and 2 closets for ample storage. Outside your bedroom is your updated bathroom with white subway tile, and two closets for linens and bonus storage.   Enjoy all the amenities Railway Square has to offer with its Assigned and Guest Parking Area, Pool, Clubhouse, Tennis and Basketball Courts, and Playground. title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Yoga Studio, Sauna
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Veda, and Friday Saturday Sunday. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Bluestone Lane, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Le Pain Quotidien. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a mani/pedi at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:

* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance

* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
